data.text: @avocato_bob @drummingnz @yorkypud82 @nzherald Antarktika is effectively stating an obvious point BUT is completely unaware of why it's obvious and not nearly as rhetorical or thought-provoking or worrying as he/she thinks.

@avocato_bob @drummingnz @yorkypud82 @nzherald IT's THIS logic that is lacking. If a consistent number of people of all ages go to hospital every day and THEN you test for a contagious but mild virus that is increasing in prevalence then it can ONLY be that an increasing number of those people who go to hospital will have it

@nzherald Another completely unhinged article from @nzherald - there's literally so much wrong with it, it's impossible to know where to start. 

DO NOT give your children the jab. Any mathematically comprehensive risk (absent from this article)/benefit analysis says it's a bad idea.
@Maveric55602697 @nzherald Exact! This is what the gov knows from the very beginning but the Pfizer deal is more important...
@nzherald How many serious case? Don't try to let children to get vax
@nzherald Seriously, herald. With your reported numbers, you have told us there are more active cases in nz, than there are people....who taught you math?
@Jason07588451 @nzherald Weâ€™re all still waiting to die from omicron
@nzherald Firstly, most of them simply don't need it, secondly, any discussion on extending the gap? Because that should be on the table if you're worried about injuries.

@nzherald anyone heard of households where members of the households are all trying to  catch ommy at the same time so their self isolation times are lined up, less disruption vs catching it sequentially and 30-50 days in self iso as household contacts? Is this legit?
